friend constexpr basic_const_iterator 
    operator+( const basic_const_iterator&amp; i, difference_type n )
        requires std::random_access_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|num=2|
friend constexpr basic_const_iterator 
    operator+( difference_type n, const basic_const_iterator&amp; i )
        requires std::random_access_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++23|num=3|
friend constexpr basic_const_iterator 
    operator-( const basic_const_iterator&amp; i, difference_type n )
        requires std::random_access_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the iterator {{c|i}} incremented or decremented by {{c|n}}.

@1,2@ Returns an iterator which is advanced by {{c|n}} positions.
@3@ Returns an iterator which is advanced by {{c|-n}} positions.

{{cpp/hidden friend|plural=yes|{{c|std::basic_const_iterator&lt;Iter&gt;}}}}.

===Return value===
@1,2@ {{c|basic_const_iterator(i.base() + n)}}
@3@ {{c|basic_const_iterator(i.base() - n)}}
